[bq="HJSDGCE"]I should read a book.

Said no one ever.[/bq]
You should read Flowers for Algernon, 1984, Catcher in the Rye, Gaia, The Laughing Man and so forth.[/bq]

"@MoogSourceVermona":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557f008663687234d7001d05#post_557f008663687234d7001d05
[bq="MoogSourceVermona"]1984 is awesome, ive never been a huge book reader but that book along with Lord of the Flies, Rumble Fish and To Kill A Mockingbird are some of the few books id say that are worth going through even if you dont normally have the patience for books[/bq]
I would add The Pearl by John Steinbeck, but that's probably just me
